subject: A long day!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_7598_2f13_3bbd
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed


I wanted a basic system using a car tuner with linear sweep. This has AM and 
FM, and stereo outputs, which might be interesting in an echo box. I started 
at about 1p yesterday, and finished at 4a this morning, then worked on it a 
couple more hours after a five hour nap. It's just wired, still needs 
tested. The car tuners still work better than the home made tuners.

Frank

_________________________________________________________________

http://maps.live.com/?icid=hmtag3
